DzFileProperty Class Reference
[Properties]

A static (non-animatable) string property that holds a file path. Attempts to save and restore as relative path when possible. More...

#include <dzfileproperty.h>

Detailed Description

A static (non-animatable) string property that holds a file path. Attempts to save and restore as relative path when possible.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum DzFileProperty::FileType

The type of file dialog that will used when the user browses for the file.

Enumerator:
FileSave 

The user will be prompted with a 'Save As' type dialog when browsing for a file.

FileOpen 

The user will be prompted with an 'Open' type dialog when browsing for a file.

Dir 

The user will be prompted with a 'Select Folder' type dialog when browsing for a directory.

DzFileProperty::DzFileProperty ( const QString &  name,
bool  isUserProperty 
)

This is an overloaded member function, provided for convenience. It differs from the above function only in what argument(s) it accepts.

Parameters:
name The name of this property.
isUserProperty If true, create a user property. User properties are properties that can be added/deleted by users.

void DzFileProperty::setFilter ( const QString &  filter  )  [virtual, slot]

Sets the filter value. It should be in the form "FilterName (*.ext1 *.ext2 *.ext3)". If this property is of type SaveFile, and if the save file is not given an extension by the user, then the first extension listed will be added to the filename. The filter is not checked if setValue() is used.

void DzFileProperty::setType ( int  type  )  [virtual, slot]

Sets the file type.

Parameters:
type The new file type for the property. Must be one of the FileType values: FileSave, FileOpen, or Dir.
